messages: The team that lost the Super Bowl by the most points was.... The broncos by 45 points in 1990. Let's renew that record. 😂
The team that lost the Super Bowl by the most points was.... The broncos by 45 points in 1990. Let's renew that record. 😂
And in the end, we were all just humans... Drunk on the idea that love, only love, could heal our brokenness.
